channel.title: Orphious - Your Destiny
channel.description:
[SIZE=3][FONT=Courier New] [CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/TvJPACY.png[/img] [HR] [CENTER]Hello everyone and welcome to my new thread, the reason i am making a new thread is because the person that our team was working with was an asshole and said that 'inferno' was his, but don't you worry. I still have the project completely up to date. He has the old server files, the one that he made no changes to. So lets get on with the details shall we :)[/CENTER] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WTJqcp6.png[/img] [/CENTER] [HR] [CENTER]Orphious is a private server that has a lot of unique content. Most of our content is and will be written from scratch. [img]http://i.imgur.com/XRzu95p.png[/img] [/CENTER] [HR] [CENTER]This is an economy server. The economy will be well structured and balanced out. We will bring you completely flawless PvP and PvM. When beta will be released we will have most of out skills working. There will be many bosses in our server. This will include Godwar bosses, King black dragon, Chaos Elemental and much more. Skilling will be one main key to bringing items into the world of Orphious; As our shops do not contain a lot of the equipment you require, We are still deciding upon which experience rates will be the best for out players. Please, Vote in the poll what your favorite experience rates will be. We will have a lot of quests to offer you; many will be from runescape and many will be custom because in my opinion custom quests make it better because nobody will know how to do them at the start. Please continue to our next section
[img]http://i.imgur.com/AWeGTqT.png[/img][/CENTER] [HR]
[CENTER][COLOR=red]Not Started yet[/COLOR] | [COLOR=orange]Started[/COLOR] | [COLOR=green]Complete[/COLOR][/CENTER]
[SIZE=5]Combat[/SIZE] [COLOR=green]Melee on Players[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Melee on Npcs[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Range on Players[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Range on Npcs[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Magic on Players[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Magic on Npcs[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Defence against Players[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Defence agains Npcs[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Correct level requirements[/COLOR]
[SIZE=5]Payer[/SIZE] [COLOR=orange]All bones buryable[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Correct xp gained[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Bones on altar[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Full prayer book[/COLOR]
[SIZE=5]Minning[/SIZE] [COLOR=red]All rocks minable[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Inspecting[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Correct respawn delays[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Correct level requirements[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Correct mining times[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Correct animations & gfxs[/COLOR]
[SIZE=5]Smithing[/SIZE] [COLOR=red]Correct level requirements[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]All items smithable[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Correct amount of bars needed[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Correct ores smeltable[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Correct animations and gfxs[/COLOR]
[SIZE=5]Fishing[/SIZE] [COLOR=orange]Correct required levels[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Correct delays[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]All fish fishable[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Correct animations and gfxs[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Bare hand Fishing[/COLOR]
[SIZE=5]Cooking[/SIZE] [COLOR=orange]Correct requirements[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]All cookable items[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Correct objects to cook on[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Correct animations[/COLOR]
MORE COMING SOON [img]http://i.imgur.com/vPuhcqS.png[/img] [HR] [CODE] [b]7/17/2014[/b] - Now all pots can be emptyed [b]7/16/2014[/b] - More drops have been added - Drop table now drops 5000 / NPC's maximum HP - Mystery box's now drop 5235 / NPC's Maximum HP [b]7/14/2014[/b] - Dragon claws special has been added with correct formula - Some server checks have been added - More tweaks to the Pickpocketing of NPC's - 97% pickpocketable npc's have been added - King graardor has been implimented - attacks will be added in a later date - Hardened godwars system started - More drops have been added [b]7/12/2014[/b] - More npc drops have been added - 90% of the Pickpocketable npc's have been added - Fixed loots of pickpocketable npc's - Fixed the rate of Pickpocketable npc's [b]7/11/2014[/b] - Fixed npcs hitting you when you fail - Thieving is being re-wrote - Fixed up more commands - while teleporting you cannot take damage or apply damage - Teleporting has been tweaked and is now better [b]7/9/2014[/b] - Fixed diagonal attacking npc's - fixed range attempting to hit again once the npc has died [b]7/8/2014[/b] - New npc boss called Orphious has been added (just 1 attack animation) - Commands is now being handled differently - Added more npc drops - A few bugs have been fixed [b]7/6/2014[/b] - Dragonfire shield now has a delay. - Fixed dragonfire sheild hitting over the npc's MaxHp - Dragonfire shield is 100% working now o - This icludes recharging, inspect and operating - Antifires now work [b]7/5/2014[/b] - Runecrafting now works 90% - Fixed slayer message 'your task is to kill 2 cow' fixed to if the amount is above one then it will say cows, if it is 1 it will say cow [b]7/4/2014[/b] - Fixed a few bugs and glitches for slayer - Loading multi npcs for certain tasks - Turael Slayer assignments nearly done - New slayer System has been started [b]7/3/2014[/b] - Idle logout now works, logs you out if youare inactive - you can now buy stackables from shops if you have a full invy + that stackable - A few glitches been patched - fixed some defence emotes for npcs, - Fixed a lot of emotes for npcs - Veng now applies to npcs like it does to players - rign of recoil now applies to npcs [b]7/2/2014[/b] - More animation fixes - Fixed a few little teleport glitches - Teleports now require runes - all teleports work in the ancient spell book - Mystery boxes have been added as a drop to all npc with hp above or equal to 5 o - Mystery boxes have an insane amount of items that can be brough into the game o - The box drop date is different from npc's, most common 1/200 or 1/180 - A new Travel token system has been added o - You can buy a travel token from a certain npc (cost 10k ea) and this gives you the ability to teleport to certain locations. [b]6/30/2014[/b] - wizards now attack using a spell - Fixed some NPC Animations [b]6/28/2014[/b] - when trying to spec without the required amount, you normally attack instead of stopping - roofs have been fixed in the client - when specing with dragon dagger on an npc, if you kill them the second hit wont show - skulling is now handled more efficiantly - Restore stats have been fixed and now works, may be a few little bugs, will fix - Restore special attack is now handled much better [b]6/22/2014[/b] - Restore stats is back up and running now more stable - Restore special attack is now more stable [b]6/20/2014[/b] - Fixed mithril seeds [b]6/19/2014[/b] - added runecrafting - added a skill manager for easy adding skills - clients colouring has changed slighly - clients water now moves - over 30 shops have been added - Fixed general store, can now sell items [b]6/18/2014[/b] - While teleporting you dont recive damage - you now cant walk while teleporting - mithril seeds have been added. still got a little work to do - fixed a few bugs with teleporting - all teleport tabs work - Now handling Teletabs the properway - More teleports have been added - More stablilization - handles restore special attack better - handled restore skills more efficiantly [b]6/17/2014[/b] - fixed dagannath area - drops have been changes slighly - Fixed delays to picking 100ms slower than it used to be. - Fixed rose bug where you could pick it while inventory is full - More drops have been added - Opening and closing base has been implimented, supporting 2 chests and a trap door atm [b]6/16/2014[/b] - Last drop bug fix? the other drop data was loading extremly rare amount values - small drop bug, uncommon was randomising the rare length of items - New drops bug has been fixed, uncommon was using the rare amount value - Object searching, Chances are slim of getting something, Nothing decent - fixed bug where you couldnt pick stackables with full invent - Fixed bug where you could walk when picking - pickable : wheat, cabbage, onions, flax, roses [b]6/15/2014[/b] - Made a drop simulator for testing drops - New and improved drop table - fixed the drops bug [b]6/14/2014[/b] - Fixed very rare drops, now perfect - Fixed drops bug, rarearity was less than what it was - some npc's have been fixed - Fixed NPC and player clipping - Ring of wealth has been added - the real effect only applies to rare drop table - Over 275 NPC's now access the rare drops table [b]6/13/2014[/b] - A few client updates - Purple sweets have been added - Added a new Npc Rare drop table, this feature will drop a random item from the rare drop table - Fixed a few issues with drops crashing server - Fixed a ton of bugs with the drop system - Rewritten Drop System - Common - uncommon - rare - very rare [b]6/12/2014[/b] - Karambwan has no delay when used with other foods - Karambwan's are now edible - Dragon dagger fixed -when before got 0 hp it would show 0 - Control panel added new features - Dragon dagger has been modified -spec now hits 1 then after 600 seconds it hits another one [b]6/11/2014[/b] - Karambwan cooking has been added - Karambwan fishing has been tweaked [b]6/10/2014[/b] - Control panel has been added [b]6/9/2014[/b] - Quest tab has been fixed - Fixed running, now you will stop running instantly when you have 0 energy - Proper Energy Method - Added a Dismantale - Fixed up Karambwan Fishing Adjusted Timer - Added Ladder Climbing - Added New Quest Interface [b]6/8/2014[/b] - Added new Drop announcements - Added global announcment method - Added the start of a Wealth generated - Karambwan Fishing Fully finished Timers perfect - Karambwan Fishing Adjusted and tweaked - karambwan fishing has been added - Fixed Full invy deleting 1 item and getting 1 item temporary - Constant drops fixed - Items now appear when you drop them - Fixed a few bugs with Teleporting - New Drop System is implimented and ready to test - Changed default clan to Help - New Starting, Brings you to the tuturial island - Teleports fixed when in the Tuturial Island - Home Teleport changed - Spawn Locations changed - Start location changed [/CODE] [HR] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/CSsniFx.png[/img][/center] [hr] [spoiler=click here] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8Tmc6dU.png[/img]
OLD MEDIA
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1Rj0XMN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PjPgIdh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CIKxGSk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rtvrmMK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fVlFF8t.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yBF2ksm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7jw5kjv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pBnFbzB.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7jw5kjv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pBnFbzB.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TSiUOI7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DU11dSD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XWSFa6u.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jPImbQ9.png[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: Orphious - Your Destiny
item.dc:creator: @Special_Air_Service Special Air Service
item.description:
@Special_Air_Service wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:13, topic:545066”][quote author=Special Air Service link=topic=663944.msg4438297#msg4438297 date=1405776061]

honestly I would make skills a low priority and work on other things first, like minigames or bosses etc. lots of players seem to not have as much interest in them as they do in combat/pvm/pvp etc

Adding bosses is the easy part to a server, I’m getting the the harder parts out the way then I’ll start with the bosses, also let me tell ya that skilling will be a huge part of the servers economy
[/quote]
I mean real bosses, with complex actions, not “ok 5000 hp max hit 99 but 0 if you have protect from melee on grind until you get divine spirit shield drop”

good luck btw[/quote]

thanks and dont worry, when i do most skills ill write a boss system, and i mean, this will be like a really epic system, not shitty bosses, bosses that hit 59999999

joke bosses that actually do different styles, spawn npcs, make gfx spots that damage you if your are standing on them, freeze, stun, basically what pvmers look for

Read full topic

item.title: Orphious - Your Destiny
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Special Air Service, post:12, topic:545066”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=663944.msg4438273#msg4438273 date=1405765315]
honestly I would make skills a low priority and work on other things first, like minigames or bosses etc. lots of players seem to not have as much interest in them as they do in combat/pvm/pvp etc
[/quote]

Adding bosses is the easy part to a server, I’m getting the the harder parts out the way then I’ll start with the bosses, also let me tell ya that skilling will be a huge part of the servers economy[/quote]
I mean real bosses, with complex actions, not “ok 5000 hp max hit 99 but 0 if you have protect from melee on grind until you get divine spirit shield drop”

good luck btw

Read full topic

item.title: Orphious - Your Destiny
item.dc:creator: @Special_Air_Service Special Air Service
item.description:
@Special_Air_Service wrote:

drubrkletern:

honestly I would make skills a low priority and work on other things first, like minigames or bosses etc. lots of players seem to not have as much interest in them as they do in combat/pvm/pvp etc

Adding bosses is the easy part to a server, I’m getting the the harder parts out the way then I’ll start with the bosses, also let me tell ya that skilling will be a huge part of the servers economy

Read full topic

item.title: Orphious - Your Destiny
item.dc:creator: @Stevenc26 Stevenc26
item.description:
@Stevenc26 wrote:

drubrkletern:

honestly I would make skills a low priority and work on other things first, like minigames or bosses etc. lots of players seem to not have as much interest in them as they do in combat/pvm/pvp etc

Yeah, as long as combat (Mage/Melee/Range) are all good, you should work on at least a few bosses.

Read full topic

item.title: Orphious - Your Destiny
item.dc:creator: @Special_Air_Service Special Air Service
item.description:
@Special_Air_Service wrote:

I don’t know wether these ‘tons of servers’ are hiding or something but what servers have this, and there are not to many servers that have full slayer, including correct tasks, tips (my tips are different from real rs) multi supportive npcs, I’m not saying I’m the only server that has it, and let me hint out another point, rarely any servers now adays even get updates, people take servers and host it, no changes, so yea.

Read full topic

item.title: Orphious - Your Destiny
item.dc:creator: @Special_Air_Service Special Air Service
item.description:
@Special_Air_Service wrote:

[SIZE=3][FONT=Courier New]
[CENTER]
[HR]
[CENTER]Hello everyone and welcome to my new thread, the reason i am making a new thread is because the person that our team was working with was an asshole and said that ‘inferno’ was his, but don’t you worry. I still have the project completely up to date. He has the old server files, the one that he made no changes to. So lets get on with the details shall we :)[/CENTER]

[/CENTER]
[HR]
[CENTER]Orphious is a private server that has a lot of unique content. Most of our content is and will be written from scratch.

[/CENTER]
[HR]
[CENTER]This is an economy server. The economy will be well structured and balanced out. We will bring you completely flawless PvP and PvM. When beta will be released we will have most of out skills working. There will be many bosses in our server. This will include Godwar bosses, King black dragon, Chaos Elemental and much more. Skilling will be one main key to bringing items into the world of Orphious; As our shops do not contain a lot of the equipment you require, We are still deciding upon which experience rates will be the best for out players. Please, Vote in the poll what your favorite experience rates will be. We will have a lot of quests to offer you; many will be from runescape and many will be custom because in my opinion custom quests make it better because nobody will know how to do them at the start. Please continue to our next section

[/CENTER]
[HR]

[CENTER][COLOR=red]Not Started yet[/COLOR] | [COLOR=orange]Started[/COLOR] | [COLOR=green]Complete[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[SIZE=5]Combat[/SIZE]
[COLOR=green]Melee on Players[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Melee on Npcs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Range on Players[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Range on Npcs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Magic on Players[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Magic on Npcs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Defence against Players[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Defence agains Npcs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Correct level requirements[/COLOR]

[SIZE=5]Payer[/SIZE]
[COLOR=orange]All bones buryable[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Correct xp gained[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Bones on altar[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Full prayer book[/COLOR]

[SIZE=5]Minning[/SIZE]
[COLOR=red]All rocks minable[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Inspecting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Correct respawn delays[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Correct level requirements[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Correct mining times[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Correct animations & gfxs[/COLOR]

[SIZE=5]Smithing[/SIZE]
[COLOR=red]Correct level requirements[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]All items smithable[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Correct amount of bars needed[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Correct ores smeltable[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Correct animations and gfxs[/COLOR]

[SIZE=5]Fishing[/SIZE]
[COLOR=orange]Correct required levels[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Correct delays[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]All fish fishable[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Correct animations and gfxs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Bare hand Fishing[/COLOR]

[SIZE=5]Cooking[/SIZE]
[COLOR=orange]Correct requirements[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]All cookable items[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Correct objects to cook on[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Correct animations[/COLOR]

MORE COMING SOON

[HR]

[CODE]
7/17/2014

  • Now all pots can be emptyed
    7/16/2014
  • More drops have been added
  • Drop table now drops 5000 / NPC’s maximum HP
  • Mystery box’s now drop 5235 / NPC’s Maximum HP
    7/14/2014
  • Dragon claws special has been added with correct formula
  • Some server checks have been added
  • More tweaks to the Pickpocketing of NPC’s
  • 97% pickpocketable npc’s have been added
  • King graardor has been implimented
    • attacks will be added in a later date
  • Hardened godwars system started
  • More drops have been added
    7/12/2014
  • More npc drops have been added
  • 90% of the Pickpocketable npc’s have been added
  • Fixed loots of pickpocketable npc’s
  • Fixed the rate of Pickpocketable npc’s
    7/11/2014
  • Fixed npcs hitting you when you fail
  • Thieving is being re-wrote
  • Fixed up more commands
  • while teleporting you cannot take damage or apply damage
  • Teleporting has been tweaked and is now better
    7/9/2014
  • Fixed diagonal attacking npc’s
  • fixed range attempting to hit again once the npc has died
    7/8/2014
  • New npc boss called Orphious has been added (just 1 attack animation)
  • Commands is now being handled differently
  • Added more npc drops
  • A few bugs have been fixed
    7/6/2014
  • Dragonfire shield now has a delay.
  • Fixed dragonfire sheild hitting over the npc’s MaxHp
  • Dragonfire shield is 100% working now
    o - This icludes recharging, inspect and operating
  • Antifires now work
    7/5/2014
  • Runecrafting now works 90%
  • Fixed slayer message 'your task is to kill 2 cow’
    fixed to if the amount is above one then it will say cows, if it is 1
    it will say cow
    7/4/2014
  • Fixed a few bugs and glitches for slayer
  • Loading multi npcs for certain tasks
  • Turael Slayer assignments nearly done
  • New slayer System has been started
    7/3/2014
  • Idle logout now works, logs you out if youare inactive
  • you can now buy stackables from shops if you have a full invy + that stackable
  • A few glitches been patched
  • fixed some defence emotes for npcs,
  • Fixed a lot of emotes for npcs
  • Veng now applies to npcs like it does to players
  • rign of recoil now applies to npcs
    7/2/2014
  • More animation fixes
  • Fixed a few little teleport glitches
  • Teleports now require runes
  • all teleports work in the ancient spell book
  • Mystery boxes have been added as a drop to all npc with hp above or equal to 5
    o - Mystery boxes have an insane amount of items that can be brough into the game
    o - The box drop date is different from npc’s, most common 1/200 or 1/180
  • A new Travel token system has been added
    o - You can buy a travel token from a certain npc (cost 10k ea) and
    this gives you the ability to teleport to certain locations.
    6/30/2014
  • wizards now attack using a spell
  • Fixed some NPC Animations
    6/28/2014
  • when trying to spec without the required amount, you normally attack instead of stopping
  • roofs have been fixed in the client
  • when specing with dragon dagger on an npc, if you kill them the second hit wont show
  • skulling is now handled more efficiantly
  • Restore stats have been fixed and now works, may be a few little bugs, will fix
  • Restore special attack is now handled much better
    6/22/2014
  • Restore stats is back up and running now more stable
  • Restore special attack is now more stable
    6/20/2014
  • Fixed mithril seeds
    6/19/2014
  • added runecrafting
  • added a skill manager for easy adding skills
  • clients colouring has changed slighly
  • clients water now moves
  • over 30 shops have been added
  • Fixed general store, can now sell items
    6/18/2014
  • While teleporting you dont recive damage
  • you now cant walk while teleporting
  • mithril seeds have been added. still got a little work to do
  • fixed a few bugs with teleporting
  • all teleport tabs work
  • Now handling Teletabs the properway
  • More teleports have been added
  • More stablilization
  • handles restore special attack better
  • handled restore skills more efficiantly
    6/17/2014
  • fixed dagannath area
  • drops have been changes slighly
  • Fixed delays to picking 100ms slower than it used to be.
  • Fixed rose bug where you could pick it while inventory is full
  • More drops have been added
  • Opening and closing base has been implimented, supporting 2 chests and a trap door atm
    6/16/2014
  • Last drop bug fix? the other drop data was loading extremly rare amount values
  • small drop bug, uncommon was randomising the rare length of items
  • New drops bug has been fixed, uncommon was using the rare amount value
  • Object searching, Chances are slim of getting something, Nothing decent
  • fixed bug where you couldnt pick stackables with full invent
  • Fixed bug where you could walk when picking
  • pickable : wheat, cabbage, onions, flax, roses
    6/15/2014
  • Made a drop simulator for testing drops
  • New and improved drop table
  • fixed the drops bug
    6/14/2014
  • Fixed very rare drops, now perfect
  • Fixed drops bug, rarearity was less than what it was
  • some npc’s have been fixed
  • Fixed NPC and player clipping
  • Ring of wealth has been added - the real effect only applies to rare drop table
  • Over 275 NPC’s now access the rare drops table
    6/13/2014
  • A few client updates
  • Purple sweets have been added
  • Added a new Npc Rare drop table, this feature will drop a random item from the rare drop table
  • Fixed a few issues with drops crashing server
  • Fixed a ton of bugs with the drop system
  • Rewritten Drop System - Common - uncommon - rare - very rare
    6/12/2014
  • Karambwan has no delay when used with other foods
  • Karambwan’s are now edible
  • Dragon dagger fixed -when before got 0 hp it would show 0
  • Control panel added new features
  • Dragon dagger has been modified -spec now hits 1 then after 600 seconds it hits another one
    6/11/2014
  • Karambwan cooking has been added
  • Karambwan fishing has been tweaked
    6/10/2014
  • Control panel has been added
    6/9/2014
  • Quest tab has been fixed
  • Fixed running, now you will stop running instantly when you have 0 energy
  • Proper Energy Method
  • Added a Dismantale
  • Fixed up Karambwan Fishing Adjusted Timer
  • Added Ladder Climbing
  • Added New Quest Interface
    6/8/2014
  • Added new Drop announcements
  • Added global announcment method
